item.name: Captain's Parrot
item.text: Battlecry: Put a random Pirate from your deck into your hand.
item.howtogetgold: Unlocked when you have all the Golden Pirates from the Expert Set.
item.flavor: Pirates and Parrots go together like Virmen and Carrots.
item.howtoget: Unlocked when you have all the Pirates from the Expert Set.

item.name: Old Murk-Eye
item.text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
item.howtogetgold: Unlocked when you have all the Golden Murlocs from the Expert and Basic Sets.
item.flavor: He's a legend among murlocs. "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.
item.howtoget: Unlocked when you have all the Murlocs from the Expert Set.
